products.title: Ecowood Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The creamy, off-white chenille fine grain, from the hardwearing ecowood range, is light and relaxed, ensuring that it will match a range of decor schemes. This durable, pvc blind is quick and simple to install, freeing up your time to sit and enjoy it. Enhance a daring, tropical purple feature wall in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the chenille fine grain against it, using glossy and glistening silvers as accents.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The designer look of the ecowood deluxe range simply cannot be beaten, and the pale cream chenille fine grain adds a new level of sophistication to the collection. Its classic look belies its hardwearing formula, as it is made from high quality, wood-look pvc for durability and water-resistance. Complement a classic brown and cream colour scheme by surrounding the chenille fine grain with chocolate browns, delicate taupes, and light oatmeals.

products.title: Choices Chenille Chic Pearl Roller Blind
products.description: With plushness in abundance and plenty of style, this choices chenille chic pearl roller blind isn't just yet another off-white offering, no. It's full of texture like nothing before it, with a cool colourway that delivers modernity into your home as well as cosy vibes.

products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Chenille Asc Cream
products.description: Chenille asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories. Perfect fit pleated blind chenille asc cream available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Chenille Chic Pearl Roman Blind
products.description: Looking for something warm, cosy and light? Then you've come to exactly the right place. This wonderful chenille chic fabric is incredibly plush and luxuriously soft to create a homely space. products.title: Plush Chenille Ivory Roman Blind
products.description: Soft as can be and incredibly light, this plush ivory roman blind has a velvety touch. It's picked out in the loveliest of light cream colourways too, softness all round. This is perfect for creating a comfy space for you to relax in. The colourway will keep you incredibly calm w soft as can be and incredibly light, this plush ivory roman blind has a velvety touch.

products.title: Luxe Chenille Smoke Roman Blind
products.description: So exactly what makes the tuiss luxe chenille so different to their standard chenille? Well its thicker for starters, and the sheen is more sophisticated, or understated if youd prefer. The texture is greater too, adding a greater cosy vibe to your home.
